name: Pears
short_description: Pears is a three-pane newsfeed (RSS/RDF/Atom) aggregator which caches downloaded feeds for offline use. It has a clean, uncluttered interface, it's easy to use and works on Windows, Linux and MacOSX. You can extend its functionality with plugins.
